summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Redis persistence, Celery Flower monitoring dashboard, and Redis HA monitoring for Survey360. All 9 critical features tested successfully.
passed_tests: Redis RDB persistence is enabled and working (dump.rdb exists and updated)
Redis AOF persistence is enabled and working (appendonly.aof exists and updated)
Redis authentication working with password protection
Celery Flower dashboard running on port 5555 with 1 worker registered
All Celery workers and tasks are properly registered and functioning
